methods.name: SetResourceNode
methods.comment: Sets the node we are mining

methods.name: DoMine
methods.comment: This is where we do the actual mining ( claim resource etc )

methods.name: ExtractResources
methods.comment: Starts the actual extraction of resources from the node

methods.name: RemoveEquipment
methods.comment: Used to unequip this equipment from client

methods.name: GetNumResourcesPerExtract
methods.comment: Returns number of resources extracted per cycle based on the currently cached resource node

methods.name: Server_ExtractResources
methods.comment: server notified of hit from client to verify

properties.name: mPickParticleSystem
properties.comment: The effect the spawn when picking.

properties.name: mCachedResouceNode
properties.comment: The node we want to pick from
